  prototype={<>SILoadStoreOptimizer::CombineInfo &#42; SILoadStoreOptimizer::checkAndPrepareMerge (CombineInfo &amp; CI, CombineInfo &amp; Paired)</>}>
This function assumes that CI comes before Paired in a basic block.

Return an insertion point for the merged instruction or nullptr on failure.

### promoteConstantOffsetToImm() {#aafbe6ce073661d12165727da21cf223c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool SILoadStoreOptimizer::promoteConstantOffsetToImm (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; CI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">MemInfoMap</a> &amp; Visited, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;, 4 &gt; &amp; Promoted) const</>}>
Promotes constant offset to the immediate by adjusting the base.

It tries to use a base from the nearby instructions that allows it to have a 13bit constant offset which gets promoted to the immediate.
